mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mostly legible, author exclaiming that their time studying at UVA ends tonight. The date above this graffiti may or may not be part of it, although the double exclamation marks punctuating the date and the graffiti suggests a connection. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
5-5-86!! | 4 years of studying in this _____ ends tonite!!
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Education, Higher
